message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to own this truly unique product. Given its value and potential, I'm offering it to you at $1,400,000. I believe this is a fair price that reflects its worth.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $1,300,000. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate you coming back with an offer. I understand your position, but the value of this product is truly significant. I could consider letting it go for $1,350,000.  This is my final offer.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I'm glad we're getting closer. I would like to propose a price of $1,325,000 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle.
